title: Imam Ali (as) - at Najaf Shrine 3
text: DESC: Imam Muhammad al-Baqir (as): Accompanying my father, I went for visiting the tomb of my grandfather, Amir al-Mu'minin `Ali ibn Abi-Talib (as), in al-Najaf. My father stopped at the holy tomb, wept, and said the following
alssalamu `ala abi al-a'immati wa khalili alnnubuwwati
DESC: My father (as) then added the following
anta wasilati ila allahi wa dhari`ati
wa li haqqu muwalati wa ta'mili
fakun shafi`i ila allahi `azza wa jalla
wa hiya fakaku raqabati min alnnari
wa bima sa'altuhu kullahi birahmatihi wa qudratihi
